channel.title: Ideas on Mike Brave
channel.description: Recent content in Ideas on Mike Brave

item.title: Ideas That Changed My Life
item.description: Toy Technologies Hidden In Plain Sight Mayan Wheels on toys vs Game Engines used in non gaming fields Reslient Systems > Efficient Systems Potato Famine Vs Incas Democracy is a resilient system Dinosaurs were efficient/specialized self reliance is another word for poverty A Good Photograph is When I Would Rather Look at The Photo Than The Initial Subject Similar to the medium is the message but rather it’s more about choosing which medium would best represent what you wanted to get out of it.
